name: Mouse in the House
description:
Mouse in the House is a group project developed during Technifutur® training in 6 weeks.

It's the story of two mice who will need to cooperate to reach the famous cheese.

You'll need a friend to play and two controllers (ps4 or xbox)

Any feedback will be appreciated. Have fun.

Animation
Loïc Mathonet

Artists
Alex De Clerck
Violette Grabski

Developers
François Malet
Tristan Jardon
